## MutationsOption type


<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type MutationsOption<S extends StateOption, G extends GettersOption<S>> = {
    [P: string]: ({ state, getters }: {
        state: S;
        getters: GettersReturnType<G>;
    }, ...payloads: any[]) => void;
};
```
